name: Rootmancy
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2023, Rootmancy sees you helping Radix the Rhizomancer grow the roots for his tree by guiding them deeper into the ground. How far do your roots grow? 

Programming - Gizmo199

Programming/Art - Fred "Seracrooce" Schmidt

Music/Voice/Writing/Art - Chris "Monte" McRae
